meanings.sent1: She stuffed the cookie into her cakehole.
meanings.sent2: The baby had crumbs all around his cakehole.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't talk with his cakehole full of marshmallows.
meanings.sent4: Her cakehole was wide open in amazement.
meanings.sent5: The dog eagerly licked his cakehole after dinner.

meanings.definition: To shut up or be quiet.
meanings.sent1: If you don't like it, just cakehole!
meanings.sent2: He needs to cakehole and listen for once.
meanings.sent3: Cakehole and enjoy the peaceful moment.
meanings.sent4: She told him to cakehole his complaints.
meanings.sent5: Cakehole your opinions and let others speak.
